content.question: In Greco-Roman mythology, Sisyphus (line 8) was condemned to

choices.label: repeatedly push a big rock up a hill
spend his life in a labyrinth

content.answer: repeatedly push a big rock up a hill

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
